players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie, who was always so active in our discussions, suddenly went silent last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other tonight."
Bob: "I agree with Diana's observation. Let's all try to be more vigilant tonight and report any unusual activity."
Bob: "I think we should all try to be more open and communicative during our discussions. Secrecy and mistrust can lead to dangerous situations. Let's work together to keep our community safe."

Diana: "I'd like to propose that we all share our thoughts and suspicions openly during our discussions. This will help build trust and make it more difficult for any potential threats to go unnoticed. Let's work together as a team to ensure the safety of our community."
You: "I agree with Bob's suggestion for open communication. Let's all share our thoughts and suspicions openly during our discussions to build trust and ensure the safety of our community."
